unnormalised: Borem, konnain tor aplea gonitachea homeworkakhatir LaTeX equations boro korpachi ut'tom vatt koxi mhunn vicharlem. Bhai, hanv tuka sangtam, ti ek yatra asa. Type kortole vixim tuka zai tem visrun voch; ekdamuch, `a + b = c` hem `a + b = c` zata. Groundbreaking, hanv zannam! Punn rav, tem odik vichitr zata.
normalised: Barobar, konnem tori tanchea ganitachea homeworkakhatir L-A-T-e-X समीकरणam koxi boroitat mhunn vicharlem. Bhai, hanv tuka sangtam, ti ek safar asa. Tum sodtat tem sodanch typ korpache visrun vochat; ekdam ashem dista a plus b barabar c mhunn a plus b barabar c zata. Groundbreaking, mhaka khobor asa! Pun thambo, tem ani veglech asta.

unnormalised: Tuk ek fraction zai asa? Sope, barobar? Chukun! Tem `\frac{numerator}{denominator}` asa. Hanv soput dita, poilech pautt hanvem tem dekhlem, mhaka distalem hanvem ek portal dusrea dimensionak ugddaila mhunn. Ani integralsicher maka suru korunk mellona. Tim kagdar kitlim sobik distat, punn `\int_{lower}^{upper} f(x) dx` type korop ek mathematical demonak apovn haddlea vori dista. Mhoji bud? Copy-paste tuzo best friend.
normalised: Fraction zai? Selhem, barem? Chuk! To backslash frac numerator denominator. Mhaka sapath asa, poili pavtim hanvem tem dekhlem tedna mhaka dislem hanvem bhulun ek portal dusrea dimensionak ugodlem mhunn. Ani integralsacher zalear hanv sangonkuch nam. Te kagdar bhov sobik distat, pun typing backslash integral from lower to upper of f of x d x mhunnmathematical demonak apoylea bhaxen dista. Mhaji sal'la? Copy-paste tuzo best friend.

unnormalised: Serious zaun sangtalea, LaTeX shoktivant asa. Tum taka lagun gellear, tum sobit equations boroita zatat zann Ramanujanak gorv divot (vo thoddem impress kelam). Fokot yaad dovrunk sas ghev, tuzo curly braces poriksha kar (tim mhojem jivitacher sankas zatat), ani "LaTeX symbol ... khatir" Google korun gheunk bhienaka. Stack Exchange tuzo guru.
normalised: Seriously tori, L-A-T-e-X shaktishali asa. Ekdam tuka tachi odhik got asli tor, tum ramarujan proud astole aesi bori समीकरणam boroitat (ki thodoi tori impress zatele). Fokot yad dovra sans geya, tumchea curly braces double-check karanka (te mhaje jivanak dukhi karit) ani "L-A-T-e-X symbol for..." mhunn Google korunk bhiev naka. Stack Exchange tuzo guru asa.

unnormalised: Ani ek pro-tip? Live preview axillem LaTeX editor vapar. Tuzem code vaastava velar sobik mathematical symbolsancher badolta dekhun tuk sandusticho anubhav yetta. Tem jaduvori asa, punn odik backslashes ani thodde rabbits zatat. Tuzhea homeworkak shubhechha! Tuka ti gorjechi asa. Khas korun tum `E=mc^2` sarkhem kiteim boro korpak zata tor.
normalised: Ani ek pro-tip? Live preview ashele L-A-T-e-X editor vapra. Tuzo code chalu velar glorious mathematical symbolsamni bodalta mhunn dekhtolea jhaun bhov santosh disata. Tem magic vhoxen asa, pun odhik backslashes ani kami rabbitsamni. Tumchea homeworkak bore dis di! Tuka tachi garaz podteli. Vishesh karun tumkam E barabar m c squared sarke barem borounk podteli mhunn.
